Drednaw.overview: The tier is still in its infancy and the metagame develops with each passing day. The sample set(s) provided below will be regularly updated until proper anaylses are in the works. See it as a rough outline to get yourself started and accustomed with what sets are commonly used.

sets.name: Shell Smash Sweeper
sets.description: Tera Dark is to OHKO non-Colbur or Tera Fairy Slowbro with +2 Crunch. Tera Ghost, on the other hand, lets Drednaw set up on Choice Scarf Paldean Tauros-F locked into Close Combat and prevent it from getting revenge killed by Toxicroak's Vacuum Wave.

Tatsugiri.overview: The tier is still in its infancy and the metagame develops with each passing day. The sample set(s) provided below will be regularly updated until proper anaylses are in the works. See it as a rough outline to get yourself started and accustomed with what sets are commonly used.

sets.name: Offensive Spinner
sets.description: Despite having no effect in singles, Commander is used so Gardevoir can't Trace Storm Drain and wall Tatsugiri. Tera Steel turns the tide on Fairy-types such as Gardevoir and Sylveon. It also helps against Cryogonal's Freeze Dry.
